amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of H. R. 1530 as reported by the committee on conference on December 13, 1995, contained in H. Rept. 104-406.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Spence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spence amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
